name: 7: Molmorth no Kiheitai
description:
7: Molmorth no Kiheitai (７ 〜モールモースの騎兵隊〜 Sebun ~Mōrumōsu no Kiheitai~, lit. "Seven: The Cavalry of Molmorth") is a tactical RPG released by Namco for PlayStation 2 on December 21, 2000.

The game is a tactical role-playing-game that uses a "Rotation Battle System" in which seven characters are placed on an isometric grid, and fight enemies in a similar pattern on the opposite grid. The same gameplay was later used in the 2003 game Venus & Braves.
